welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Afyonkarahisar, where the historic charm of its ancient ruins and the natural beauty of its hot springs await you. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Salim Usta
restaurants.description: Salim Usta is a turkish home cooking restaurant located in Afyonkarahisar.
restaurants.address: Zulali cikmaz araligi Uzun carisida'de, 03100 Afyonkarahisar
